import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Button, Checkbox, Icon, Grid, Modal, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' import GearIcon from 'mdi-react/GearIcon'; export default function Farmpopup() { const [firstOpen, setFirstOpen] = React.useState(false) const [addOpen, setAddOpen] = React.useState(false) const [editOpen, setEditOpen] = React.useState(false) const [deleteOpen, setDeleteOpen] = React.useState(false) const [state, setState] = useState("Myfarm"); return ( <> setFirstOpen(true)} style={{"cursor":"pointer", "color": "black"}}/> setFirstOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setFirstOpen(true)} open={firstOpen} > Farm Options
setAddOpen(false)} open={addOpen} size='small' style={{ "height": "35%", "width": "45%" }} > New Item } > Delete Your Account

Are you sure you want to delete your account

 ) }
